name: vsts-changed-files-multibranch
description: Azure DevOps pipeline task to get changed files since last build
author: MohamedElhabib

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run build && jest
scripts.pack: npm run build && npm run test && npm run pack:modules && npm run pack:extension && npm run pack:clean
scripts.pack:modules: cp package.json changed-files && cp package-lock.json changed-files && cd changed-files && npm ci --prod
scripts.pack:clean: rm changed-files/package.json && rm changed-files/package-lock.json && rm -r changed-files/node_modules
scripts.version: node scripts/version.js && git add package-lock.json package.json changed-files/task.json vss-extension.json
